snippet.description: Porto is an interesting Portuguese city on the Douro River, a processing and aging center for Port wine with a variety of tourist attractions.

snippet.description: There are two types of trains that go from Porto to Coimbra. The journey takes just under 1h if you take the fast train (Alfa Pendular) and costs about 12€.
